name: Arch Summoner
description:
Combine elements to automatically summon monsters! Discover new recipes to summon more types of monsters! Duplicate recipes will up your summon rate for the monster they create.

Invade and terrorize the world at large with your monstrous army!

This game was rushed and is suuuuuper short and easy. However, I learned a lot working on it :). Shout outs to KodaSoda64 for the element icons. She had nothing to do with my travesty of an alchemy circle.
